=== Python Development with PyDev and Eclipse - Tutorial
Lars Vogel
2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 vogella GmbH
Version 2.0
01.08.2013
=== Python, Pydev and Eclipse This article describes how to write and debug Python programs with Eclipse
This article is based on Eclipse 4.3, Python 3.3.1 and PyDev version 2.7.3.
